content: Hey folks, we are doing a deep dive into WAMR and have some feature enhancement ideas, and may be able to contribute them to the project. Does anyone know who is maintaining WAMR, is there a point of contact we could reach out to for a quick chat?
cc @Wang Xin and @Mingqiu Sun
This topic was moved here from #general > WAMR by Till Schneidereit
Hi Chris, thank you for your interest in WAMR. Xin is our project manager in Beijing, so a time slot friendly to Asia would be preferable.
@Chris Woods we love to talk with you about your proposals. We can have an online meeting. My email address is xin.wang@intel.com.

@Mingqiu Sun @Wang Xin thanks for reaching out, I'll follow up via email, we are US Eastern / Central timezones. I call late one night our time, would be 9 am your time (I think). I'll find a slot and send an invite. Looking forward to learning more from you, and explaining how we are using WAMR.
